    public static enum Codecs.DIGEST
extends Enum<Codecs.DIGEST>
implements Codecs.DigestCodec
    Instance of DigestCodec

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      HASH160
      Provides hash computation of combination RIPEMD and SHA-256.
      HASH256
      Provides hash computation of double SHA-256.
      MD5
      Provides MD5 hash computation.
      RIPEMD160
      Provides RIPEMD hash computation.
      SHA256
      Provides SHA-256 hash computation.

      • checksum

        public byte[] checksum(byte[] data,
                       int offset,
                       int len)
        Get first 4 bytes of digested hash value to detect error.
        Specified by:
        checksum in interface Codecs.DigestCodec
        Parameters:
        data - an array of bytes.
        offset - an offset to start from in the array of bytes.
        len - a number of bytes to use, starting at the offset.
        Returns:
        an array of bytes for the hash computation result.
